recipesJson.name: Glass apple remix
recipesJson.author: Tvsty1
recipesJson.description:
This is a remix of glass apple by proto jetsam.

I liked the original but found it harsh so thought I'd remix it with newer flavours.

Fa fuji gives us the bulk of our apple flavouring.at 2% I don't get that harsh bite I get from it. 

Cap double apple just to brighten up fa fuji a little.

Fa juicy strawberry at 1.5% gives us that sweet strawberry note without it being the main flavour.

Fa peach/flv peach gives a nice rounded peach flavour without the harshness I get from most peach flavourings.

Ws23 can be added.
